Other Tools

Projects

TicketEase

Project Overview

TicketEase is a comprehensive desktop ticketing system tailored for managing tickets related to ships and fast crafts. It features an intuitive interface that allows users to navigate effortlessly while efficiently handling ticket management for maritime operations.

Key Features

  • Secure Authentication: Implements Google API for secure user authentication, enhancing account protection and user trust.
  • Automated Notifications: Utilizes SMTP configuration to send timely email notifications to customers regarding ticket status and updates.
  • Data Management: A comprehensive database schema designed to handle various ticketing needs while ensuring data integrity.

Tech Stack
